snippet.title: F-Zero Pocket - Release Trailer (PC Fan-game)
snippet.description:
Ever wanted to try what a GameBoy Color episode of F-Zero would feel like?

You can experience it by downloading the Windows version of F-Zero Pocket, available now!
https://linky439.itch.io/f-zero-pocket

Not playable on a real hardware of course, but who knows what the future holds.
Maybe I'll try my hand at it, one day... In the mean time, I hope you'll enjoy this little fan-game of mine!

----------------------------

This fan-game was originally released on September 1st, 2020. The trailer was made for the F-Zero 30th Anniversary Fan Showcase here :Since then, I decided it would be nice to have it in standalone form as well.
